Uses of Class
ca.ualberta.c301w13t12recipes.model.Recipe

Packages that use Recipe
ca.ualberta.c301w13t12recipes.controller Controller package, contains the classes for Adapters, managers and controllers fulfill the controller part of the MVC model 
ca.ualberta.c301w13t12recipes.model Model package, contains the classes for mostly data structures and object fulfill the model part of the MVC model
